mapper.insert: insert into personal_introduceman (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, materialsname, materialsadjunct) values(#{PersonalUserid}, #{PersonalreviewID},#{materialsname},#{materialsadjunct});
insert into personal_others (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, title, projectscan) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{title},#{projectscan});

insert into personal_research_materials (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, starttime, stoptime, workunit, job, jobcontent, assistcertify) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID}, #{starttime},#{stoptime},#{workunit},#{job},#{jobcontent},#{assistcertify});

insert into personal_basic_message (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, unit, unitlevel, personalidentitynature, reviewyear, name, nameformer, sex, nation, idnumber, birthday, fillingtime, startworktime, workingyears, reviewmeeting, wantprofessionseries, wantmajor, wantmajorstatus, executivefunction, executivefunctiontime, executivefunctionexplatin, phone, email, fileorganizationname, politicsstatus, nativeplace, address, idcardfront, idcardcontrary, manphoto) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID}, #{unit},#{unitlevel},#{personalidentitynature},#{reviewyear},#{name},#{nameformer},#{sex},#{nation},#{idnumber}, #{birthday},#{fillingtime},#{startworktime},#{workingyears},#{reviewmeeting},#{wantprofessionseries},#{wantmajor}, #{wantmajorstatus},#{executivefunction},#{executivefunctiontime},#{executivefunctionexplatin},#{phone},#{email}, #{fileorganizationname},#{politicsstatus},#{nativeplace},#{address},#{idcardfront},#{idcardcontrary},#{manphoto});

insert into personal_education (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, graduationtime, graduationschool, educationproject, major, education, degree, lengthofschooling, educationid, educationdegreecredential) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{graduationtime},#{graduationschool},#{educationproject},#{major},#{education},#{degree},#{lengthofschooling},#{educationid},#{educationdegreecredential});

insert into personal_major_experience (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, starttime, whereschoolwork, endtime, post, workunit, certifyman, helpcertify) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{starttime},#{whereschoolwork},#{endtime},#{post},#{workunit},#{certifyman},#{helpcertify});

insert into personal_occupational_qualification (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, qualificationname, gettime, ratifyoffice, majorname, credentialnumber, assistcertify) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{qualificationname},#{gettime},#{ratifyoffice},#{majorname},#{credentialnumber},#{assistcertify});

insert into personal_paper_patents (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, publishtime, paperclasses, role, ifmagnumopus, insertperiodical, authorityindexes, yearperiodical, reward, papername, ifrecommend, paperlevel, papercover, papercatalog, papercontent) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{publishtime},#{paperclasses},#{role},#{ifmagnumopus},#{insertperiodical},#{authorityindexes},#{yearperiodical},#{reward},#{papername},#{ifrecommend},#{paperlevel},#{papercover},#{papercatalog},#{papercontent});

insert into personal_performance_achievement (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, performancename, starttime, stoptime, projectlevel, projectcontent, personaleffect, achievementeffect, projectscan, personalprojectscan, projectawardsscan) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{performancename},#{starttime},#{stoptime},#{projectlevel},#{projectcontent},#{personaleffect},#{achievementeffect},#{projectscan},#{personalprojectscan},#{projectawardsscan});

insert into personal_performance_awards (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, projectname, awardslevel, awardtime, awardorganization, content, assistcertify) values (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{projectname},#{awardslevel},#{awardtime},#{awardorganization},#{content},#{assistcertify});

insert into personal_performance_patents (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, patentsname, patentstype, gettime, patentsintroduce, assistcertify) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{patentsname},#{patentstype},#{gettime},#{patentsintroduce},#{assistcertify});

insert into personal_reviewall (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, reviewdate, review, reviewstatusname, reviewname, reviewlevel, createdate, reviewhandintime,reviewstate) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{reviewdate},#{review},#{reviewstatusname},#{reviewname},#{reviewlevel},#{createdate},#{reviewhandintime},#{reviewstate});
insert into personal_worksummary (PersonalUserid, PersonalreviewID, worksummary) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalreviewID},#{worksummary});

insert into personaluser (PersonalUserid, PersonalUsername, password, unitusername, email, phonenumber, headphoto, createdate) VALUES (#{PersonalUserid},#{PersonalUsername},#{password},#{unitusername},#{email},#{phonenumber},#{headphoto},#{createdate});
